verses.name: Zechariah 9:1
verses.text: The burden of the word of the Lord in the land of Hadrach, and Damascus shall be the rest thereof: when the eyes of man, as of all the tribes of Israel, shall be toward the Lord.

verses.name: Zechariah 9:2
verses.text: And Hamath also shall border thereby; Tyrus, and Zidon, though it be very wise.

verses.name: Zechariah 9:3
verses.text: And Tyrus did build herself a strong hold, and heaped up silver as the dust, and fine gold as the mire of the streets.

verses.name: Zechariah 9:4
verses.text: Behold, the Lord will cast her out, and he will smite her power in the sea; and she shall be devoured with fire.
